transport.question: I have wheels and go on the road. People ride in me to go places. What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 You see me every day.
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Families ride in me together.
🚦 I need a road to drive on.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people to faraway places. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am much bigger than a bird.
✈️ I have wings, but I don't flap them.
🌎 You can travel around the world on me.

transport.question: I go on tracks and can carry many people. Choo choo!

hints.text: 🚂 I have many carriages.
🛤️ I follow a special path made of metal.
📣 I make a loud noise when I arrive at the station.

transport.question: I float on water and can take people across the sea.

hints.text: 🌊 I am bigger than a duck!
⚓ I need an anchor to stay in one place.
🛥️ I can be big or small, and I travel on the ocean.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you use your feet to make me go.

hints.text: 🤸 You need to balance to ride me.
🛎️ I often have a bell to let people know I am coming.
🛣️ I am great for riding around the neighborhood.

transport.question: I am big and yellow and take children to school every day.

hints.text: 🛑 I have flashing red lights.
🚌 I stop often to pick up kids.
🎒 Many students sit in me.

transport.question: I have a siren and help people who are sick or hurt.

hints.text: 🚨 My siren goes 'wee-ooh, wee-ooh!'
🤕 I have a bed inside for patients.
🏥 I take people to the hospital very quickly.

transport.question: I use sails to move and travel on the water using the wind.

hints.text: 🌬️ I need a strong breeze.
⛵ My sails catch the wind.
🌊 I can be used for racing on the ocean.

transport.question: I zoom through space, taking astronauts to the moon and beyond!

hints.text: 🚀 I make a lot of noise and fire!
👨‍🚀 People who fly me wear special suits.
✨ I explore outer space.

transport.question: I can travel underwater and explore the ocean's depths.

hints.text: 🐠 I can go where the sunlight cannot reach.
🤿 I have a periscope to see above the surface.
🔦 I use sonar to navigate in the dark depths.

plant.question: I have roots, but I'm not a tree. I have leaves, but I'm small and green. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I grow from the ground.
🧺 You might find me in a garden.
💧 I need water to live.

plant.question: I am big and tall, with many leaves. Birds like to build their nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me.
🌳 I can give you shade on a sunny day.
🍁 My leaves change color in the fall.

plant.question: I am a fruit that grows on a tree. I am red, yellow, or green, and people like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 Snow White liked me (maybe too much!).
👩‍⚕️ An [me] a day keeps the doctor away.
🥧 You can make pie with me.

plant.question: I am a long, orange vegetable. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 Bugs Bunny's favorite snack.
🥗 You can eat me raw in a salad.
👀 I can help you see better!

plant.question: I have thorns, but I smell sweet. I come in many colors, and people give me as a gift. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 I am often given on Valentine's Day.
💐 I can be part of a bouquet.
🥀 I need a vase to stay alive

plant.question: I am a grain that grows in a field. You can make bread, cereal, or pasta from me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I turn gold when I am ready.
🍞 Many animals eat me.
🚜 Farmers grow lots of me.

plant.question: I am a plant that has seeds inside a pod. I can be green, yellow, or purple, and you can eat me as a vegetable. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I grow on a vine.
🥄 I can be added to soup.
👶 You can eat me with a spoon.

plant.question: I am a vegetable that grows underground. I have brown skin and white or yellow flesh, and you can make french fries from me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍟 You can mash me.
🥔 I am a root vegetable.
🌍 I came from South America.

plant.question: I am a tree that has needles instead of leaves. People decorate me during Christmas. What am I?

hints.text: 🎁 I might have presents under me.
🌲 I smell nice and piney.
🌟 You might put a star on top of me.

plant.question: I am a tall, green plant with a thick stalk. You can eat me as a vegetable, and popcorn comes from me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 Some people say I am knee-high by the 4th of July!
🐶 I can be part of a maze.
🍿 Movie theaters sell my product.
